summary: Broad experience (over 10 years) in HW/System development: IP, FPGA, SoC, PCB, digital/mixed-signal for several application domains (embedded video/image processing for consumer and industrial applications, embedded DSP, radio pipes for automotive). Both technical (engineering, architecting) as well as managerial (project management, team leadership, subcontracting, supplier management, multi-site).
